purpose: Compute the sector-mixed Hamiltonian H(λ)=A_transport + λ (I⊗C4) using Z6 character decomposition; export dispersion parameters; perform λ-sweep summaries.
math_facts: Because A_m⊗I4 and I59⊗C4 commute, the spectrum of H_m(λ) is exactly { a_i(m) + λ*c_j } where a_i(m) are eigenvalues of A_m and c_j are eigenvalues of C4.
Thus eigenvalue trajectories are linear in λ with slopes c_j∈{3,-1,-1,-1}.

coin_C4.matrix: K4 - I4 (Cayley graph on V4 with 3 nontrivial generators)

notable_numbers.global_top_always: (m=0, symmetric coin mode, base top eigenvalue) for λ in [0,2]
